channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside St James church, 27th December
item.description:
The drain grating has come loose yet again & also the drain is blocked & when it rains it floods the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury

item.title: A small patch was done last week but it failed to address 3metres of problem., 27th December
item.description:
Outside the entrances to 2 & 1 Greenhills Road on the Westbound carriageway. Note Road is narrow until it becomes Charlton Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole around drain on corner of road, 27th December
item.description:
Just after the junction/traffic lights is an awful pothole around the drain. Please assess & fix thanks x

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Perspex windows missing on shelter, 27th December
item.description:
Bus shelter has Perspex windows (x3) missing from north and east side of the shelter. Large window on north side is leaning against the shelter wall but two pieces missing at the back are no longer around.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A38, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of rubbish in the lay-by and beyond, 27th December
item.description:
Heading along the Golden Valley from Cheltenham towards Gloucester in the lay-by the bin is never emptied and the rubbish is overflowing into the lay-by and along the grass verge {what a mess it looks along the gateway from Cheltenham to Gloucester) not a good advertisement for the Arle Court Park and Ride visitors !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
